sql.remarks: search by GIRO Payee account information

sqls.sql:
SELECT distinct gai.ID,gai.UEN_NO UEN,gai.LICENCE_ID,SUBSTRING ( gai.LICENCE_NO, 0, 14 ) LICENCE_NO , gai.SVC_NAME,gai.LICENSEE_NAME,gai.REMARKS, gai.BANK_CODE, gai.BANK_NAME, gai.BRANCH_CODE, gai.ACCT_NAME, gai.ACCT_NO, gai.DDA_REF_NO
FROM giroAccountInfoView gai where gai.STATUS = 'CMSTAT001' <#if uen??> AND charindex(:uen, gai.UEN_NO) >0 </#if> <#if licensee??> AND charindex(:licensee, gai.LICENSEE_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if licenceNo??> AND charindex(:licenceNo, gai.LICENCE_NO) >0 </#if>

SELECT distinct opv.ID , opv.ORG_ID,SUBSTRING ( opv.LICENCE_NO, 0, 14 ) LICENCE_NO , opv.UEN_NO, opv.SVC_NAME, opv.LICENSEE_NAME from UenLicView opv where 1 = 1 <#if uenNo??> AND charindex(:uenNo, opv.UEN_NO) >0 </#if> <#if licensee??> AND charindex(:licensee, opv.LICENSEE_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if licenceNo??> AND charindex(:licenceNo, opv.LICENCE_NO) >0 </#if> <#if licIds??> AND ${licIds} </#if>

SELECT * from ( select dbo.f_hcinameconcat(ag.ID) as HCI_NAME, a.ID,a.APP_GROUP_NO,a.AMOUNT,a.PMT_TYPE,a.PMT_STATUS,a.TXN_REF_NO,a.INVOICE_NO,a.ACCT_NO,a.PAY_DESC from application_group as ag join giro_payment_view as a on ag.GROUP_NO=a.APP_GROUP_NO join application as app on app.APP_GRP_ID=ag.ID where app.STATUS not in ('APST006','APST009','APST045') ) t1 where 1=1 and PMT_STATUS in ('PMT09','PMT03') <#if groupNo??> and charindex (:groupNo,APP_GROUP_NO)>0 </#if> <#if acctNo??>and charindex (:acctNo,ACCT_NO) >0</#if> <#if amount??>and charindex (:amount,AMOUNT) >0 </#if> <#if txnRefNo??> and charindex (:txnRefNo,TXN_REF_NO)>0</#if> <#if hciName??> and charindex (:hciName,HCI_NAME)>0</#if>
